scripts.cosmos: docker start cosmosdb&& for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' cosmosdb`) do @set MONGOIP=%a&& set port=3000&& node ./src/initialize/loadMongo.test.js
scripts.test: docker start ptab-mongo && for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' ptab-mongo`) do @set MONGOIP=%a&& set port=3000&&node ./src/initialize/loadMongo.test.js
scripts.startlocal: docker start ptab-mongo && for /f "usebackq delims=" %a in (`docker inspect --format '{{.NetworkSettings.Networks.nat.IPAddress}}' ptab-mongo`) do @set MONGOIP=%a&& set port=3000&& node server.js -dev
